name: Cats Hidden in Maple Hollow
description:
Cats Hidden in Maple Hollow is a cute hidden object game set in a cozy American town that embodies the very essence of autumn.

100 cats are waiting for you to be discovered within a hand-drawn background.
Relax thanks to the chill soundtrack

Found a cat? Click on it!Features 1 Level, 100 cats
Easter Eggs
Hint System
In-game Settings
